comment:
Very well built 
Every thing in the right place

Nose: maple, hot, 
Taste: thin, brown sugars, lite spice, lots of American Oak
Finish: lingering burn

H2O
1 capful - more pronounced Oak, fresh cut wood
2 capful - same as 1 cap with more mellow flavor; favorite 
3 capful - too tampered; lose bite of barrel proof
